# isSupplementaryInterfaceHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the view hides supplementary interface objects.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var isSupplementaryInterfaceHidden: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Supplementary interface objects include the Live Text button and Quick Actions, depending on the item type. Setting this property invokes the [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/ImageAnalysisInteraction/setSupplementaryInterfaceHidden(_:animated:)] method, passing this property value and `true` for the `animated` parameter.

## Querying the interface state

- **liveTextButtonVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Live Text button appears.
- **hasInteractiveItem(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether active text, data detectors, or supplementary interface objects exist at the specified point.
- **hasSupplementaryInterface(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether supplementary interface objects exist at the specified point.
- **selectableItemsHighlighted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the interaction highlights actionable text or data the analyzer detects in text.
